fields.comment: This is used for example to separate people in different tribes.
fields.name: herd_id

fields.comment: Predators are considered threats by other species and hunt for food.
fields.name: is_predator

fields.comment: 0 means king of the hill. Greater number = more likely to get eaten by other species.
fields.name: food_chain_rank

fields.comment: if 1, thunder mage doesn't attack this
fields.name: friend_thundermage

fields.comment: if 1, fire mage doesn't attack this
fields.name: friend_firemage

fields.comment: if 1, this animal will not try to attack player who would normally be its friend
fields.name: berserk_dont_attack_friends
